definitions.definition: The process of becoming, or the state of being, acclimated , or habituated to a new climate , surroundings , or situation ; especially, acclimatization .
The adaptation of an organism to its natural climatic environment.

main_definition: The process of becoming, or the state of being, acclimated , or habituated to a new climate , surroundings , or situation ; especially, acclimatization .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) The adaptation of an organism to its natural climatic environment.
